greedy_joker.name: Greedy Joker
greedy_joker.effect: Played cards with Diamond suit give +4 Mult when scored.

lusty_joker.name: Lusty Joker
lusty_joker.effect: Played cards with Heart suit give +4 Mult when scored.

wrathful_joker.name: Wrathful Joker
wrathful_joker.effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +4 Mult when scored.

gluttonous_joker.name: Gluttonous Joker
gluttonous_joker.effect: Played cards with Club suit give +4 Mult when scored.

jolly_joker.name: Jolly Joker
jolly_joker.effect: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

zany_joker.name: Zany Joker
zany_joker.effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

mad_joker.name: Mad Joker
mad_joker.effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind

crazy_joker.name: Crazy Joker
crazy_joker.effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

droll_joker.name: Droll Joker
droll_joker.effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush.

sly_joker.name: Sly Joker
sly_joker.effect: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

wily_joker.name: Wily Joker
wily_joker.effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

clever_joker.name: Clever Joker
clever_joker.effect: +150 Chips if played hand contains a Four of a Kind

devious_joker.name: Devious Joker
devious_joker.effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight.

crafty_joker.name: Crafty Joker
crafty_joker.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush.

half_joker.name: Half Joker
half_joker.effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards.

joker_stencil.name: Joker Stencil
joker_stencil.effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot. Joker Stencil included (Currently X1 Mult)

four_fingers.name: Four Fingers
four_fingers.effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

mime.name: Mime
mime.effect: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

ceremonial_dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
ceremonial_dagger.effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult (Currently +0 Mult)

marble_joker.name: Marble Joker
marble_joker.effect: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

loyalty_card.name: Loyalty Card
loyalty_card.effect: x4 Mult every 6 hands played 5 remaining

8_ball.name: 8 Ball
8_ball.effect: Create a Planet card if played hand contains 2 or more 8s (Must have room)

dusk.name: Dusk
dusk.effect: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of the round

raised_fist.name: Raised Fist
raised_fist.effect: Adds double the rank of lowest card held in hand to Mult

fibonacci.name: Fibonacci
fibonacci.effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

steel_joker.name: Steel Joker
steel_joker.effect: This joker gains X0.25 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck (Currently X1 Mult)

scary_face.name: Scary Face
scary_face.effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

abstract_joker.name: Abstract Joker
abstract_joker.effect: +3 Mult for each Joker card (Currently +0 Mult)

delayed_gratification.name: Delayed Gratification
delayed_gratification.effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

pareidolia.name: Pareidolia
pareidolia.effect: All cards are considered face cards

gros_michel.name: Gros Michel
gros_michel.effect: +15 Mult1 in 4 chance this is destroyed at the end of round.

even_steven.name: Even Steven
even_steven.effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored (10, 8, 6, 4, 2)

odd_todd.name: Odd Todd
odd_todd.effect: Played cards with odd rank give +30 Chips when scored (A, 9, 7, 5, 3)

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

business_card.name: Business Card
business_card.effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played to Mult

ride_the_bus.name: Ride the Bus
ride_the_bus.effect: +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card (Currently +0 Mult)

space_joker.name: Space Joker
space_joker.effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

egg.name: Egg
egg.effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

burglar.name: Burglar
burglar.effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

blackboard.name: Blackboard
blackboard.effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are Spades or  Clubs

runner.name: Runner
runner.effect: Gains +10 Chips if played hand contains a Straight (Currently +20 Chips)

ice_cream.name: Ice Cream
ice_cream.effect: +100 Chips-5 Chips for every hand played

dna.name: DNA
dna.effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

splash.name: Splash
splash.effect: Every played card counts in scoring

blue_joker.name: Blue Joker
blue_joker.effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck (Currently +104 Chips)

sixth_sense.name: Sixth Sense
sixth_sense.effect: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card (Must have room)

constellation.name: Constellation
constellation.effect: Gains X0.1 Mult per Planet card used (Currently X1 Mult)

hiker.name: Hiker
hiker.effect: Every played card permanently gains +4 Chips when scored

faceless_joker.name: Faceless Joker
faceless_joker.effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

green_joker.name: Green Joker
green_joker.effect: +1 Mult per hand played -1 Mult per discard  (Currently +0 Mult)

superposition.name: Superposition
superposition.effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight (Must have room)

to_do_list.name: To Do List
to_do_list.effect: Earn $5 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes on every payout

cavendish.name: Cavendish
cavendish.effect: X3 Mult 1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round
cavendish.unlockRequirement: It is technically unlocked at start, but can only be bought or found if  Gros Michel Gros Michel+15 Mult1 in 4 chance this is destroyed at the end of round. has been destroyed during the current run.

card_sharp.name: Card Sharp
card_sharp.effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

red_card.name: Red Card
red_card.effect: Gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped (Currently +0 Mult)

madness.name: Madness
madness.effect: When Blind is selected, gain X0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker (Currently X1 Mult)

square_joker.name: Square Joker
square_joker.effect: Gains +4 Chips if played hand has exactly 4 cards (Currently 16 Chips)

sance.name: Séance
sance.effect: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card (Must have room)

riffraff.name: Riff-Raff
riffraff.effect: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers (Must have room)

vampire.name: Vampire
vampire.effect: Gains X0.2 Mult per Enhanced card played, removes card Enhancement (Currently X1 Mult)

shortcut.name: Shortcut
shortcut.effect: Allows Straights to be made with gaps of 1 rank (ex: 2 3 5 7 8)

hologram.name: Hologram
hologram.effect: Gains X0.25 Mult per playing card added to your deck (Currently X1 Mult)

vagabond.name: Vagabond
vagabond.effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $3 or less

baron.name: Baron
baron.effect: Each King held in hand gives X1.5 Mult

cloud_9.name: Cloud 9
cloud_9.effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round (Currently $4)

rocket.name: Rocket
rocket.effect: Earn $1 at end of round. Gains $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

obelisk.name: Obelisk
obelisk.effect: X0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand (Currently X1 Mult)

midas_mask.name: Midas Mask
midas_mask.effect: All face cards become Gold cards when played

luchador.name: Luchador
luchador.effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

photograph.name: Photograph
photograph.effect: First played face card gives X2 Mult when scored

gift_card.name: Gift Card
gift_card.effect: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

turtle_bean.name: Turtle Bean
turtle_bean.effect: +5 hand size, reduces by 1 each round

erosion.name: Erosion
erosion.effect: +4 Mult for each card below 52 in your full deck (Currently +0 Mult)

reserved_parking.name: Reserved Parking
reserved_parking.effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

mailin_rebate.name: Mail-In Rebate
mailin_rebate.effect: Earn $3 for each discarded [rank], rank changes every round

to_the_moon.name: To the Moon
to_the_moon.effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

hallucination.name: Hallucination
hallucination.effect: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened (Must have room)

fortune_teller.name: Fortune Teller
fortune_teller.effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run (Currently +0)

stone_joker.name: Stone Joker
stone_joker.effect: This Joker gains +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck (Currently +0 Chips)

lucky_cat.name: Lucky Cat
lucky_cat.effect: Gains X0.2 Mult each time a Lucky card successfully triggers (Currently X1 Mult)
lucky_cat.unlockRequirement: Available from start. (need a lucky card in deck to see in shop)

baseball_card.name: Baseball Card
baseball_card.effect: Uncommon Jokers each give X1.5 Mult

bull.name: Bull
bull.effect: +2 Chips for each dollar you have (Currently +0 Chips)

diet_cola.name: Diet Cola
diet_cola.effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

trading_card.name: Trading Card
trading_card.effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

flash_card.name: Flash Card
flash_card.effect: +2 Mult per reroll in the shop (Currently +0 Mult)

spare_trousers.name: Spare Trousers
spare_trousers.effect: Gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair (Currently +0 Mult)

ancient_joker.name: Ancient Joker
ancient_joker.effect: Each played card with [suit] give x1.5 Mult when scored. Suit changes at end of round.

ramen.name: Ramen
ramen.effect: X2 Mult, Loses X0.01 Mult per card discarded

walkie_talkie.name: Walkie Talkie
walkie_talkie.effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

seltzer.name: Seltzer
seltzer.effect: Retrigger all cards played for the next 10 hands

castle.name: Castle
castle.effect: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded [Suit] card, suit changes every round (Currently +0 Chips)

smiley_face.name: Smiley Face
smiley_face.effect: Played face cards give +4 Mult when scored

campfire.name: Campfire
campfire.effect: This Joker gains X0.5 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated (Currently X1 Mult)

golden_ticket.name: Golden Ticket
golden_ticket.effect: Played Gold cards earn $3 when scored
golden_ticket.unlockRequirement: Play a five card hand that contains only Gold cards.

mr_bones.name: Mr. Bones
mr_bones.effect: Prevents Death if chips scored are at least 25% of required chips self destructs

acrobat.name: Acrobat
acrobat.effect: X3 Mult on final hand of round

sock_and_buskin.name: Sock and Buskin
sock_and_buskin.unlockRequirement: Play 300 face cards across all runs.

swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
swashbuckler.effect: Adds the sell value of all owned Jokers left of this card to Mult (Currently +1 Mult)

troubadour.name: Troubadour
troubadour.unlockRequirement: Win 5 consecutive rounds by playing only a single hand in each. (Discards are fine.)

certificate.name: Certificate
certificate.effect: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand
certificate.unlockRequirement: Have a Gold card with a Gold Seal.

smeared_joker.name: Smeared Joker
smeared_joker.effect: Hearts and Diamonds count as the same suit,  Spades and  Clubs count as the same suit
smeared_joker.unlockRequirement: Have 3 or more Wild Cards in your deck.

throwback.name: Throwback
throwback.effect: X0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run (Currently X1 Mult)
throwback.unlockRequirement: Continue a run from the Main Menu.

hanging_chad.name: Hanging Chad
hanging_chad.effect: Retrigger first played card used in scoring
hanging_chad.unlockRequirement: Beat a Boss Blind with a High Card hand.

rough_gem.name: Rough Gem
rough_gem.effect: Played cards with Diamond suit earn $1 when scored
rough_gem.unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Diamonds in your deck

bloodstone.name: Bloodstone
bloodstone.effect: 1 in 3 chance for played cards with Heart suit to give X2 Mult when scored
bloodstone.unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Hearts in your deck.

arrowhead.name: Arrowhead
arrowhead.effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored
arrowhead.unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Spades in your deck.

onyx_agate.name: Onyx Agate
onyx_agate.effect: Played cards with Club suit give +8 Mult when scored.
onyx_agate.unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Clubs in your deck

glass_joker.name: Glass Joker
glass_joker.effect: Gains X0.5 Mult for every Glass Card that is destroyed (Currently X1 Mult)
glass_joker.unlockRequirement: Have 5 or more Glass cards in your deck.

showman.name: Showman
showman.effect: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

flower_pot.name: Flower Pot
flower_pot.effect: x3 Mult if played hand has a scoring Diamond suit card,  Club suit card,  Heart suit card, and  Spade suit card

blueprint.name: Blueprint
blueprint.effect: Copies ability of Joker to the right

wee_joker.name: Wee Joker
wee_joker.effect: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored (Currently +10 Chips)
wee_joker.unlockRequirement: Win a run in 18 or fewer rounds.

merry_andy.name: Merry Andy
merry_andy.unlockRequirement: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds

oops_all_6s.name: Oops! All 6s
oops_all_6s.effect: Doubles all listed probabilities (ex: 1 in 3 -> 2 in 3)
oops_all_6s.unlockRequirement: Earn at least 10,000 Chips in a single hand.

the_idol.name: The Idol
the_idol.effect: Each played [rank] of [suit] gives X2 Mult when scored Card changes every round
the_idol.unlockRequirement: In one hand, earn at least 1,000,000 Chips.

seeing_double.name: Seeing Double
seeing_double.effect: X2 Mult if played hand has a scoring Club card and a scoring card of any other suit
seeing_double.unlockRequirement: Play a hand that contains four 7 of Clubs.  Other suits that count as clubs (e.g. wild suits) with rank 7 will also count.

matador.name: Matador
matador.effect: Earn $8 if played hand triggers the Boss Blind ability
matador.unlockRequirement: Defeat a Boss Blind in one hand, without using discards.

hit_the_road.name: Hit the Road
hit_the_road.effect: Gains X0.5 Mult per discarded Jack this round (Currently X1 Mult)
hit_the_road.unlockRequirement: Discard 5 Jacks at the same time.

the_duo.name: The Duo
the_duo.effect: x2 Mult if played hand contains a Pair
the_duo.unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Pair.

the_trio.name: The Trio
the_trio.effect: x3 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind
the_trio.unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Three of a Kind

the_family.name: The Family
the_family.effect: X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind
the_family.unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Four of a Kind.

the_order.name: The Order
the_order.effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight
the_order.unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Straight.

the_tribe.name: The Tribe
the_tribe.effect: x2 Mult if played hand contains a Flush
the_tribe.unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Flush.

stuntman.name: Stuntman
stuntman.unlockRequirement: Earn at least 100 million (100,000,000) Chips in a single hand

invisible_joker.name: Invisible Joker
invisible_joker.effect: After 3 rounds, sell this card to Duplicate a random Joker (Currently 0/3)  (Removes Negative from copy)
invisible_joker.unlockRequirement: Win a game while never having more than 4 jokers.

brainstorm.name: Brainstorm
brainstorm.effect: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

satellite.name: Satellite
satellite.effect: Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used this run

shoot_the_moon.name: Shoot the Moon
shoot_the_moon.effect: +13 Mult for each Queen held in hand.
shoot_the_moon.unlockRequirement: Play every Heart card in your deck in one round.

drivers_license.name: Driver's License
drivers_license.effect: x3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced cards in your full deck (Currently 0)

cartomancer.name: Cartomancer
cartomancer.effect: Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected (Must have room)

astronomer.name: Astronomer
astronomer.effect: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

burnt_joker.name: Burnt Joker
burnt_joker.effect: Upgrade the level of the first discarded poker hand each round

bootstraps.name: Bootstraps
bootstraps.unlockRequirement: Have two or more Polychrome Jokers at once

canio.name: Canio
canio.effect: Gains X1 Mult when a face card is destroyed (Currently X1 Mult)
canio.unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

triboulet.name: Triboulet
triboulet.effect: Played Kings and Queens each give x2 Mult when scored
triboulet.unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

yorick.name: Yorick
yorick.effect: X5 Mult only after using 23 discards (Discards left: 23)
yorick.unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

chicot.name: Chicot
chicot.effect: Disables effect of every Boss Blind
chicot.unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

perkeo.name: Perkeo
perkeo.effect: Creates a Negative copy of 1 random consumable card in your possession at the end of the shop
perkeo.unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.
